title: Golden Seaweed
summaries: The Golden Seaweed was used to summon a pet Golden Turtle. It lasted until the player manually canceled the buff by using the Golden Seaweed again. It was obtained from Chests, but only on the [img:Amazon Appstore]Amazon Fire TV. It was obtainable on other mobile devices via trading.
This item was removed alongside all other mobile exclusive content in the Mobile 1.3.0.7 update.
Players on [img:Windows Phone] Windows Phone who acquired the Golden Seaweed via trading continue to have access to it.
